bio: Variancesol came into existence because we (a bunch of developers with a combined experience of over 30 years) decided to do things bit differently. We all have been working in different capacities some working as developers and designers, some as team leaders and some as project mangers. The common things we however felt is, that the client is often treated as entity who is external to the setup, and very often his views/thoughts are not properly translated. The reason why it happens is not because what client wants is not understood properly but because the project is never taken as 'it is my project'. It is never (well almost!) thought of what is going to be good and important for the system and the approach is 'the client or the specs did not mention that'.We want to change that, take a project and then treat it as if it is our own. When we start doing it, we start thinking what will be good and better for the system. Of course we may not have a complete understanding of the domain

Payment methodsWe do not want any advance for the projects, irrespective of the size and volume. We however would want the amount (either 100% or partial as agreed upon) to be deposited in the Escrow account before we start the work.FREE support to resolve issues/fix bugs for 30 days. We will be sending a daily update on the progress of the project. If desired the code will be handed over to the client once the project is complete

abstrac: Solution Leaders, Web Development Company, Outsourcing, iOS & Android Apps Development, Website Designing, Application Development, WordPress Joomla & eCommerce, Node.JS, ReactJS, AngularJS
bio:
Happy New Year 2023 :)

Greetings,

My name is Yasir and I am the CEO & Founder of a well reputed Software/Web  Development Company name "LEADconcept" - located in Lahore, Pakistan [GMT +5 hours] with front office in California & Ontario.

At LEADconcept, we build powerful digital solutions and experiences for your business. Our team adjust working hours as per US/Canada time zone for all the important meetings, discussions, and feedback sessions regarding our projects.

We can self-assuredly provide you references of our past client's so that you may verify our company's reputation without any hassle. No beating around the bush, please go ahead and verify what our clients declare about LEADconcept from  reviews/ratings. We strongly believe in friendly relationship with clients to give them sense of security & flexibility.

Web & Mobile Development: Our Primary Services

Web Applications, Custom Development, OpenSource Customization, Responsive websites, PHP/MySQL, CodeIgniter, Laravel, WordPress CMS Websites or Plugin Development, Custom eCommerce Solution, WooCommerce, Python/Django, ROR, Joomla, Drupal, OpenCart, Magento, Prestashop, BigCommerce, Shopify etc., Node.JS, ReactJS, VueJS, ExpressJS, AWS, AWS Cognito, Angular JS, JavaScript, Native Mobile Apps, Hybrid Apps Apps (ReactNative or Flutter), C#, JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX. HTML5, AWS Lambda, AWS DynamoDB, API Gateway and many more.

Our Services

- Custom Software Development
- Web Design & Development
- Mobile App Development
- Digital Marketing
- Graphic Designing

- SEO (On-page & Off-Page)

- Contents Writing

Our Workflow

- Establish Contract
- Gather Requirements
- Envision Project Direction
- Design & Development
- Testing & Close Project
- Support & Maintenance

Feel free to get in touch for any inquiry that you may have and I would be happy to assist you, as I am practically online 24/7.

Thank you,
LEADconcept
www.leadconcept.com

We are flexible in payment terms and prefer to work in milestones, because client's satisfaction & long-term relationships is more valuable for us.

- Our team is always there to cater your ongoing and future needs to maintain long-term business relationship & above all we provide 5 months FREE support/maintenance after the completion of the project.

- Another hallmark is that we have flexible working hours and our team adjust timings according to clients needs & limitations.

- Our working hours are Monday to Friday, 1:00 PM till 10:00 PM (Pakistan Standard Time, GMT + 5 hours) but in case of crucial deadlines, we turned on Saturday/Sunday & work late hours to achieve the deadline. Our team can always adjust the working hours according to client's availability.

- You will be dealing directly with a dedicated team lead (One point of contact) & team lead will be responsible to keep in touch with you throughout the development phase (Thru' Skype/Emails/Phone) and handling the developer’s team internally. Our team lead will also be responsible to show you the progress online on our demo server time to time to get your feedback and come up with our suggestions/ideas during the development phase.

We have no problem signing the NDA/Contract Agreement to protect both parties, moreover, we can provide you references from all around the globe.

Thanks
LEADconcept
www.leadconcept.com
